name: Pearson Talentlens
description: At Pearson, we’re committed to a world that’s always learning and to our talented team who makes it all possible. From turning textbooks into laptop lessons to enabling people to develop throughout their careers, we are always re-examining the way people learn best, whether its children progressing through school or an education community across the globe. We are bold thinkers and standout innovators who motivate each other to explore new frontiers in an environment that supports and inspires us to always be better. By pushing the boundaries of technology — and each other to surpass these boundaries — we create seeds of lifelong learning that become the catalyst for the world’s innovations, personal and global, large and small.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Talent assessments to help you predict performance and assess the suitability of your candidates
ShortDescription: TalentLens is part of Pearson plc. We are an international talent assessment business, using psychometrics to help organisations select and develop top performers and high potential.
enhanced_description: Pearson Talentlens, an international talent assessment business and part of Pearson plc, specializes in leveraging psychometrics to help organizations select and develop top performers and high potential candidates. This pre-employment testing and screening software is designed to predict candidate performance, evaluate critical thinking skills, and identify cultural fit, ultimately boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity through data-driven hiring decisions.
competitive_advantages: Ability to predict candidate performance and cultural fit
Backed by Pearson plc's long-standing reputation in learning and assessment
